name: Gambit
description:
My first ever Game Jam game! Made this game on my own but did use royalty free assets and some tutorials to help me along the way.

Intended for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. I came up with this idea super late in the week so its rather unpolished but I had a blast challenging myself and making it!

I will be continuing to improve the game as a side project so hopefully I can get some feedback on improvements.
